temples.name: Bogotá Colombia Temple
temples.address: Carrera 46 N°127-45 Bogotá Distrito Capital Colombia
ordinanceSchedule: Endowment sessions start every hour on the hour between 7AM and 7PM Tuesday through Saturday
Baptism sessions start every our hour on the hour between 9AM and 6PM Tuesday through Saturday
Initiatory sessions start every our hour on the hour between 10AM and 5PM Tuesday through Saturday

temples.name: Barranquilla Colombia Temple

ordinanceSchedule: Endowment sessions start every hour on the hour between 10AM and 7PM Tuesday through Saturday
Baptism sessions start every two hours on the hour between 9AM and 6PM Tuesday through Saturday
Initiatory sessions start every our hour on the hour between 2AM and 5PM Tuesday through Saturday
Sealing sessions: start every two hours on the hour between 2PM and 8PM Tuesday through Saturday

Baptism sessions start every our hour on the hour between 9AM and 6PM Tuesday through Saturday
Initiatory sessions start every our hour on the hour between 2PM and 5PM Tuesday through Saturday
Sealing sessions: Twice per day in the afternoom (appointments)
